backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization mixin, user profile storage, and extensive resident-related data types like vitals, ADLs, medications, and contacts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a physician-signature print-layout feature and listing affected frontend components and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document providing root mount node and loading the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile-setup modal, and application shell layout.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: ADL tab component displaying ADL records in a table with optional add-record modal access.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal for submitting new ADL records with fields for date, activity, assistance level, and staff notes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Component showing an access-denied message with a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects a user's name, role, and optional related resident IDs, then saves the profile via a mutation.
Layout wrapper handling login/logout via Internet Identity and rendering either a login screen or the main app shell with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication names and allows adding new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating MAR records by selecting an active medication and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medication lists with optional edit, add, discontinue, and reactivate actions.
Shows a resident’s medications with status badges and supports adding, editing, and discontinuing medications when allowed.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form for creating a new medication, collecting dosage, route, times, physician, and notes, then submitting via useAddMedication.
Modal for editing an existing medication with prefilled fields and updating it through useUpdateMedication.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Displays a styled badge showing a resident’s code status as DNR or Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Large modal for creating a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, contacts, pharmacy, insurance, and medications.
Modal for editing resident demographics, physicians, room info, code status, and pharmacy details, then updating via useUpdateResident.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, physicians, pharmacy info, and active/discontinued medications.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of recorded daily vitals for a resident and provides an option to record new vitals if permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering daily vital signs and submitting them via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, vitals, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup with theme variables, dark mode, and print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Helper functions for checking user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Resident dashboard page showing stats, search/filter controls, and a sortable resident list with add-resident modal.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Renders the resident profile page with tabs, medication management, vitals, ADLs, printing, and multiple edit/add modals. Handles permissions, data fetching, and user interactions for resident-related actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash. Supports hash-based and standard query strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate. Sets project-wide styling tokens and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versions, features, and pending requests, including the feature for adding physician signature underline fields when a toggle is enabled.
